Title: Establishes who qualifies as an authorized agent of a voter
Summary: Establishes who qualifies as an authorized agent of a voter; prohibits an agent of the voter or authorized agent from receiving no more than five absentee ballots for an election; establishes penalties for failing to deliver a ballot and interfering with a voter's marking of a ballot.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to authorized agents of a voter
